channel.title: Spamming/flaming
channel.description:
Hey guys, this week I'll be using moparscape a lot more, and just want to say:
[size=30pt]ANYONE[/size] caught flaming, or spamming WILL be permanently banned(or muted, depending on what was said/done).
If your [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,274273.0.html]posts don't follow our rules, then you will be punished. We don't want, or need you here.[/url]

item.title: Spamming/flaming
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Hey guys, this week I’ll be using moparscape a lot more, and just want to say:

[size=30pt]ANYONE[/size] caught flaming, or spamming WILL be permanently banned(or muted, depending on what was said/done).

If your posts don’t follow our rules, then you will be punished. We don’t want, or need you here.

Read full topic
